attributes.additional_details:
In 2012 a mass killing of badgers will take place.
For six weeks next year a test will be taking place to kill badgers in two parts of England (which are still to be decided) Why? Each year 25,000 cattle are thought to have to be put down to the fault of badgers passing on Tuberculosis.
Vaccinations is a possible action. But the government dont want to spend money and time on the more humane option.

Please sign so we can save these beautiful creatures. Every animal diserves to live.
